Yue Hu is an associate professor in the [Department of Political Science](https://www.dps.tsinghua.edu.cn/index.htm) at Tsinghua University. Hu is a comparativist and methodologist in political science. His research interests include political psychology, political linguistics, socioeconomic inequality and public opinion, and identity in urban politics.
